data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jean H. HUBER (1998): A new Cyprinodont species with a uniquely-colored female, Aphyosemion hera n. sp. (Cyprinodontifonnes, Pisces), from northwestern Gabon. Revue Suisse De Zoologie 105 (2): 331-338, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.33580
